abstracts.cdata!:
The overall development objective of the
            Avian and Human Influenza Control and Preparedness Project
            is to contribute to government's national plan which
            aims to minimize the threat posed to humans and the poultry
            sectors by highly pathogenic avian influenza (HPAI)
            infection and other zoonoses in Lao PDR, and to prepare for,
            control, and respond to influenza pandemics and other
            infectious disease emergencies in humans. Prior amendments
            included reallocation of proceeds and extension of the
            closing date for the Avian and Human Influenza Facility
            (AHIF) grant Changes are to: a) the baselines and targets of
            some indicators; b) reflect evolving government policy; c)
            reflect the realities on the ground; and d) replace one
            indicator that, as currently formulated, could not be tracked.
